\large



\[
C = \theta  e^{\lambda  t} 
  \left(
     \delta \left(\delta _1 x_1^{-\rho _1} +
     \left(1-\delta _1\right) x_2^{-\rho _1}\right){}^{\frac{\rho }{\rho _1}} +
     (1-\delta ) x_3^{-\rho } 
     \right){}^{-1/\rho }
\]
   
\begin{align*}
\frac{
\frac{\partial C}{\partial x_1} }{
\frac{C}{x_1}
}& = \frac{\delta  \delta _1 x_1^{-\rho _1} \left(\delta _1 x_1^{-\rho _1}-\left(\delta
   _1-1\right) x_2^{-\rho _1}\right){}^{\frac{\rho }{\rho _1}-1}}{\delta  \left(\delta _1
   x_1^{-\rho _1}-\left(\delta _1-1\right) x_2^{-\rho _1}\right){}^{\frac{\rho }{\rho
   _1}}-(\delta -1) x_3^{-\rho }}
\\[6mm]
\frac{
\frac{\partial C}{\partial x_2} }{
\frac{C}{x_2}
}& =
\frac{\delta  \left(1-\delta _1\right) x_2^{-\rho _1}
   \left(\delta _1 x_1^{-\rho _1}-\left(\delta _1-1\right) x_2^{-\rho
   _1}\right){}^{\frac{\rho }{\rho _1}-1}}{\delta  \left(\delta _1 x_1^{-\rho
   _1}-\left(\delta _1-1\right) x_2^{-\rho _1}\right){}^{\frac{\rho }{\rho _1}}-(\delta
   -1) x_3^{-\rho }}
\\[6mm]
\frac{
\frac{\partial C}{\partial x_3} }{
\frac{C}{x_3}
}& =  -\frac{\delta -1}{\delta  x_3^{\rho } \left(\delta _1 x_1^{-\rho
   _1}-\left(\delta _1-1\right) x_2^{-\rho _1}\right){}^{\frac{\rho }{\rho _1}}-\delta
   +1}
\end{align*}
